sentences.english: Each tooth has a space, the so-called pulp cavity.
sentences.chinese: 我们每颗牙齿里面都有一个空间，即所谓的牙髓腔。

sentences.english: Clinical and visible the periodontosis that causes by dental pulp disease changes.
sentences.chinese: 临床可见由牙髓病引起的牙周病变。

sentences.english: Through hematic source infection causes dental pulp phlogistic very scarce.
sentences.chinese: 通过血源感染引起牙髓炎十分少见。

sentences.english: Root canal therapy is currently the most effective treatment for pulpal and periapical diseases.
sentences.chinese: 根管治疗是目前牙髓病和根尖周病最有效的治疗方法。

sentences.english: If decay is left untreated, it will reach the tooth's pulp.
sentences.chinese: 如果龋坏没得到治疗，它将进入牙髓。

sentences.english: MTA is a new material developed for endodontics in 90′s.
sentences.chinese: MTA是九十年代发展的用于牙髓病治疗的新材料。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical effect of pulp resinifying on treating pulp disease and peri-apical disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨牙髓塑化对牙髓病和根尖周病的临床效果。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical effect of pulp resinifying on treating pulp disease and peri-apical disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨牙髓塑化对牙髓病和根尖周病的临床效果。

sentences.english: Objective Evaluation of light-cured resin filling wedge-shaped defects on the impact of pulp.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价光固化树脂充填楔状缺损对牙髓的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the transmission signal of the experimental pulpitis pain.
sentences.chinese: 了解实验性牙髓炎疼痛信号在中枢的传导特点。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the response of the treatment of combined enzootic - periodontal Lesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察牙周牙髓联合病变的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the feasibility of examining the pulp vitality with pulse oximetry.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用脉搏血氧测定法测试牙髓活力的可行性。

sentences.english: Human dental pulp cells were fibroblast-like cells.
sentences.chinese: 人牙髓细胞呈成纤维细胞形。

sentences.english: Root canal therapy is a fundamental method of treating pulpal and periapical diseases nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 根管治疗是现今牙髓病和根尖周病的基本治疗方法。

sentences.english: Outer layer of the tooth enamel and ivory to protect the pulp quality.
sentences.chinese: 牙齿的外层有珐琅质及象牙质来保护牙髓。

sentences.english: What is the chance of the pulp dying, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 医生，牙髓坏死是常见的死吗？

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
to fill a tooth (cavity)/to have a tooth filled/a dental filling
